mapper.select: SELECT e.*, c.det_sort as pos_sort FROM employee e LEFT JOIN code_detail c ON e.emp_pos_cd = c.det_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{loginEmpId}
SELECT det_id AS pos_cd, det_sort AS pos_sort FROM code_detail WHERE cod_id = 'pos' AND det_sort < #{docEmployeePosSort} ORDER BY det_sort DESC

SELECT E.EMP_ID, E.EMP_NUM, -- 사번 E.EMP_NM, -- 사원명 E.EMP_POS_CD, -- 직급코드 COALESCE(CAT.DET_NM, NULL) AS EMP_CAT, -- 소속명 COALESCE(POS.DET_NM, NULL) AS EMP_POS, -- 직급명 COALESCE(DEP.DET_NM, NULL) AS EMP_DEP, -- 부서명 COALESCE(TEAM.DET_NM, NULL) AS EMP_TEAM, -- 팀명 COALESCE(E.MEG_NUM, NULL) AS MEG_NUM -- 상급자 사번 FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN CODE_DETAIL CAT ON CAT.DET_ID = E.EMP_CAT_CD LEFT JOIN CODE_DETAIL POS ON POS.DET_ID = E.EMP_POS_CD LEFT JOIN CODE_DETAIL DEP ON DEP.DET_ID = E.EMP_DEP_CD LEFT JOIN CODE_DETAIL TEAM ON TEAM.DET_ID = E.EMP_TEAM_CD WHERE E.EMP_POS_CD != 'pos_05' AND E.EMP_STS_CD = 'sts_01' ORDER BY E.EMP_NUM
